amerikanu aanduwe mulikathwayen 2012, 2013 saha 2104 warshayanhidi shri lankawe wagawima, sanhidiyawa saha manawa himikam prawardhanaya kirima yana themawa yatathe manawa himikam kawunsilayata idiripath karana lada yojana thunama sammatha wiya. 2012 yojanawa magin shri lankanduwen illa sitiye ugath padam saha sanhidiya komisame sadhaniya nirdesha kriyathmaka karana lesa saha emagin aawaranaya nowu yuda samaye siduwu bawata kiyawena barapathala manawa himikam kelesim pilibanda wishwasaniya saha swadhina parikshanayak karana lesa ya.
japan kandayama mema tharagaya 2-1k washayen jayagaththe, owunta sahaya dimata kridanganayata pamini japan jathikayan ge olwarasan madhyayeni.
bodu bala sena sanwidhanaya hamuwe thibenne jathika prashnayak bawa ki galagodaaththe gnyanasara himiyo podi podi sippikatu thama sanwidhanaya samaga patalenna ena bawada kiya sitiyaha.
ee anuwa waraddagena thibenne ma nowana bawa hiruta therenawa athi .

widesha balapam hamuwe dana nonamu ethumage nirbhaya ha uththunga kriya piliwetha hethuwen wasara 30k thisse merata bhishanayata lak kala koti thrasthawadaya nandikadal kalapuwen awasan kara damimata piyawara gaththe ya.parajaya kala nohaki yayi athamun ki koti sanwidhanaya parajaya kirima, wides balapam hamuwe thama mathaya wenas nokirima ha rata sanwardhanaya kirime kramanukula wada piliwelath nisa kisindu janadhipathiwarayek merata ithihasaye nolabu aakaraye jayagrahana rasak ethuma wisin shri lanka nidahas pakshayata uruma kara dunne ya.
